General.Name: Tibet Urban Development and Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet Urban Development and Investment Co.,LTD, together with its subsidiaries, develops, operates, manages, and sells real estate properties in China. The company also engages in the mining investment business; leasing and financing activities; and management of outlets, as well as operates a hotel. The company was formerly known as Tibet Jinzhu Co., Ltd. Tibet Urban Development and Investment Co.,LTD was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Lhasa, China.
General.Address: Jintai Group Office Building, Lhasa, China, 850030

4.Name: Ms. Rong  Fu
4.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
